64 About Principles for Sustainable Insurance 
Principles for Sustainable Insurance
 
Last year, Aegon joined thirty other leading insurance companies in signing the UN Principles for Sustainable Insurance. These principles 
are about making sure sustainability becomes “business as usual”. There are four principles in all. Against each one, Aegon has  set itself 
targets and objectives, and will be reporting its progress every year, both in the company’s yearly Review and on its corporate website.
